title: A Kindred Discussion
body:
So, with the reveal of the new Champion, Kindred, there have been some interesting questions being asked. 

Will she be viable as an adc? (or top or mid even)

What exactly will the effects be of a % max health damage on top of an "infinite" scaling bonus be?

Will she even be viable in the jungle when she is lacking cc for ganks aside from a minor slow?

Will her Ult be the most overpowered thing in existence or will it just be another bard ult?

Anyway I'd like to talk about it.

I have my own opinions, but I feel like they will most likely be abhorrently opposed, so I just want to hear peoples' opinions first before my onslaught of downvoting happens
